Uses of Package
padcms.magazine.page.elementview

  • Packages that use padcms.magazine.page.elementview 
    Package Description
    padcms.magazine.factory  
    padcms.magazine.page  
    padcms.magazine.page.elementview  
  • Classes in padcms.magazine.page.elementview used by padcms.magazine.factory 
    Class and Description
    ActiveZoneElementView
    advert The PDF, JPEG, PNG with advertising that will display within advert_duration seconds resource (string) relative path to the resource advert_duration (int) time inseconds
    AdvertElementView
    advert The PDF, JPEG, PNG with advertising that will display within advert_duration seconds resource (string) relative path to the resource advert_duration (int) time inseconds
    BackgroundElementView
    background Background is a PDF, JPEG, PNG or an HTML/CSS/Images.
    BaseElementView
    This is basic class for all view elements of page.
    BodyElementView
    body The body content is the main element of an article template.
    DragAndDropElementView
    drag_and_drop We can add many mini-articles, there are displayed with different orientation (gradient) and positionned randomly.
    GalaryElementView
    gallery Gallery is a field that must contain at least 2 images or be empty.
    Html5ElementView
    html5 html5_body (string) the type of html data: code, google_maps, rss_feed, facebook_like, twitter post_code (string) HTML5 code (used with code type of body) google_link_to_map (string) Link to google map (google_maps) rss_link (string) Link to the rss (rss_feed) rss_link_number (integer) Amount of rss links (rss_feed) facebook_name_page (string) Facebook page (facebook_like) twitter_account (string) Twitter account name (twitter) twitter_tweet_number (integer) Amount of displayed twites (twitter)
    HtmlElementView
    html Displays HTML page when user rotate device (template_type=“rotation”) or user touches the display (template_type=“touch”) resource (string) relative path to the resource html_url (string) page's URL template_type (enum) touch | rotation
    MiniArticleElementView
    mini_article There can be many mini-articles, so it’s multiple field.
    OverlayElementView
    overlay Overlay content is displayed on the semi-transparent layer on top of the background content when 'legend' button is clicked.
    PopupElementView
    popup The same as gallery resource (string) relative path to the resource
    ScrollingPaneElementView
    scrolling_pane Scrolling pan is a PDF, JPEG, PNG or an HTML/CSS/Images element that can have any height and scrolls freely vertically resource (string) relative path to the resource top (int) set in pixels, it defines where this element should be shown at the beginning.
    SlideElementView
    slide Slide is a multiple field which may be PDF / HTML or PNG/JPEG.
    SoundElementView
    sound Sound is an MP3 or Mp4 audio file.
    VideoElementView
    video Video is an MP4 or a stream URL.
